#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define getcx getchar
#define maxn 1005
#define F(i,p,n) for(i=p;i<n;i++)
#define I(i,p,q) for(i=p;i>=q;i--)
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define P(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define Ps(x) printf("%lld ",x)
#define LL long long int
#define pii pair<int,int>
int mod=1e9+7,n,m,s,sz;
LL dp[65000];
void dp_cal()
{
    int i,j,k;
    LL temp[65000],a[65000]={0};
    sz=2*s;

    F(i,1,s+1)
    {
        dp[i]=i;
        dp[sz-i+1]=m/i;
    }
    temp[1]=1;
    F(i,2,sz+1)
    temp[i]=dp[i]-dp[i-1];
    F(i,2,n+1)
    {
        F(j,1,sz+1)
        {
            a[j]=(dp[sz+1-j]*temp[j]+a[j-1])%mod;
        }
         F(j,1,sz+1)
        {
            dp[j]=a[j];
        }
    }
}
int main()
{
    int i,j,k;
    S(n);
    S(m);
    s=sqrt(m);


    dp_cal();
    P(dp[sz]);
    return 0;
}
